text: Feruglio may refer to: == People == * Egidio Feruglio, Italian geologist (1897–1954) * Egidio Feruglio (cyclist), Italian cyclist (1921–1981) * Antonio Feruglio, bishop of Vicenza (d. 1909) * Manlio Feruglio, Italian soldier (1892–1917) == Other == * 73442 Feruglio, an asteroid
title: Feruglio
